Posts.EditableText: I play tested it and gives no errors, I discontinued the one with a 1 star rating because I did that and I was a dumbo and new to making games on quest, despite 3 game postings this is the first game I've made, it was posted a second time because the game errored and became an empty game, 3rd time because of the bad rating from being an idiot. Link to the newest one: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/essxllxw_koct5rezjmx4a/be-a-giantess-and-a-tiny-teleporter-and-clothes-update
